verbs.description: [ARG1: The Korean Central News Agency] , [R-ARG1: which] [V: is] [ARG2: North Korea 's state media agency] , made the announcement amid ongoing peace talks with South Korean President Moon Jae - in and negotiations to meet with President Trump .

[ARG0: The Korean Central News Agency , which is North Korea 's state media agency ,] [V: made] [ARG1: the announcement] [ARGM-LOC: amid ongoing peace talks with South Korean President Moon Jae - in and negotiations to meet with President Trump] .

The Korean Central News Agency , which is North Korea 's state media agency , made the announcement amid ongoing peace talks with South Korean President Moon Jae - in and negotiations to [V: meet] [ARG1: with President Trump] .
